Description:
Action, tells of the adventures of one of the horsemen of the apocalypse named "War". Over the n-th number of levels he will run around the world of the near future, where demons have destroyed all of humanity.
"War" will find out who is the devil's spawn brazenly violated the agreement and incinerated ancient human race. In so doing, it will help thousands of years as a proven weapon and fighting skills that can be easily upgraded for the little soul, fall out of defeated enemies, and faithful horse that makes it easy to ride through the devastated city and kill vermin.



Features:
- The story of the famous Joe Madureira. The visual style and the script developed by the author of the popular comic Joe Madureira (X-Men, Battle Chasers, and The Ultimates).
- Cinematic. With the latest technology, Ã‚Â«DarksidersÃ‚Â» completely takes you into the world of the apocalypse! Detailed special effects, dazzling lighting and a powerful soundtrack is completely immersed in the game.
- Huge open world. You can explore every corner of a post-apocalyptic world absolutely free. You have no limits - go where you want.
- His anger knows no bounds. War - fully lives up to its name. He brings down on his opponent's punches, instantly moving around the battlefield, and the supernormal cast of enemies in indescribable horror.
- Arsenal War. At your disposal as a mythic and modern weapons. Moreover, almost any subject you can find - a weapon!
- Bring back your power. Devour the soul and restore their ability to help the lost.
- Rider. In the event of war may need to call his ghostly steed named Ruin.
